function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implement strict infection control measures, provide adequate ppe, and redesign hospital spaces to allow for better social distancing.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement strict social-distancing measures, use technology to monitor and enforce distancing protocols","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement advanced air pressure control systems, design and utilize anterooms as buffers","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Optimize space utilization, consider alternative layout designs, use digital communication technologies","category":"Selection of materials","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementing effective ventilation systems and air purifiers, and maintaining proper air pressure differentials","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing effective containment measures such as anterooms and negative pressure differentials","category":"Control of airflows (airtight / negative pressure)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Careful consideration of operational protocols and designs to balance safety and cost","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improving ventilation systems and air purification methods","category":"Air purification","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporating natural ventilation methods into architectural design","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adopting natural ventilation and passive design principles","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adopting adequate disinfection and purification processes","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular maintenance and upgrade of ventilation and air filtration systems","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Selection of safe, non-toxic building materials and regular air quality monitoring","category":"Selection of materials","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proper disposal of internal filters as medical waste and use of alternative biofiltration technologies","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integrate infectious disease considerations into building designs and operational procedures","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Separate thermal space conditioning from ventilation provisions to improve energy efficiency and reduce disease transmission","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement triage and examination protocols to reduce exposure and separate patients with infectious disease symptoms","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of high-efficiency air filtration systems and increased ventilation rates to reduce airborne pathogen concentration.","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improved ventilation systems, air purifiers, use of protective masks","category":"Air purification","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airflow control measures, direction of airflow patterns, ventilation system optimization","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase cleaning frequency and restock supplies in advance","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilize simulation programs to coordinate engineering disciplines and match their needs","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Provide training in public health for architects and engineers engaged in hospital design to ensure adequate sunlight access and minimize indoor viral communities.","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporate natural ventilation and improved filtration efficiency in early design stages, specification writing, and construction of healthcare settings.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporate sunlight into lighting designs in healthcare settings to reduce reliance on artificial lighting and improve infection control.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Thorough review of comprehensive literature sources and expert consultation","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comprehensive data collection on various building types and ventilation systems, collaboration with building owners and facility managers for data sharing","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Validation of simulation models with real-world data, collaboration with experts in simulation modeling and building design","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"In-depth study of ventilation and air conditioning systems, collaboration with hvac experts, and public health professionals","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Research on sustainable engineering design principles, collaboration with environmental and sustainability experts","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforcing strict social distancing measures, providing personal protective equipment, and regular testing","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing staggered work shifts, utilizing technology for remote supervision, and improving communication between stakeholders","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Government financial support, infrastructure investment, and policy incentives for construction projects","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementing strict health and safety protocols, providing ppe, and enforcing social distancing measures","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Training programs for skilled workers, addressing shortages of materials, exploring alternative materials and construction methods","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Invest in training programs, diversify suppliers, and streamline supply chain","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase production and distribution of personal protective equipment","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict social distancing protocols, reorganize workspaces","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict safety protocols, provide personal protective equipment, and enforce social distancing measures","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negotiate flexible contracts, provide training on safety protocols, and integrate digital project management tools","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Develop risk management strategies, establish emergency funds, and explore alternative sources of funding","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Identify at-risk suppliers, diversify the supply chain, and establish strategic stockpiling of essential materials","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Developing an alternative permit oversight system or increasing resources to manage permits","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement strict safety protocols and social distancing measures during in-person interviews. require the use of personal protective equipment ppe .","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct qualitative content analysis and correspondence analysis to explore the impacts of covid-19. share findings to increase awareness and preparedness.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use a combination of in-person and online interviews to capture diverse perspectives. follow-up with additional online surveys or virtual discussions.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Include quantitative data and cross-validation of results from different research methods","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Peer review and validation of coding by multiple researchers","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct initial exploratory study to define key categories of impacts before qualitative analysis","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing safety protocols and guidelines to reduce the risk of covid-19 transmission in construction sites.","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"High"}]}
